explains: n. 卡其裤；卡其服装；卡其黄（khaki 的复数）

sentences.en: Reportedly, Bill's khakis is one of the best pants on the market.
sentences.cn: 据报道，美国Bill公司的卡其裤是市场上最好的裤子之一，而美国L.

sentences.en: Functional casual, basically: jeans and khakis, an assortment of button-front shirts, some cotton sweaters.
sentences.cn: 基本上是功能性的便装：牛仔裤，卡奇装，清一色的带纽扣衬衫，还有些棉的套头衫。

sentences.en: Substitute Lighter Options: Jeans can weigh more than khakis and dress pants, and tennis shoes can weigh more than your favorite clogs.
sentences.cn: 更轻便的替代品方案：牛仔裤要比卡其布和正装重些。 跟你喜欢的木屐相比网球鞋也更重些。
